languages.text: {n}Техножрица отшатывается.{/n} "Это безумие, техноварварство! Если вы желаете свершить кощунство силой, то мне вас не остановить — я нарушу покой духа машины сама. Но я обязана буду зарегистрировать богохульство шестой категории!"

{n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрица отшатывается.{/n} "Это безумие, техноварварство! Если вы желаете свершить кощунство силой, то мне вас не остановить — я нарушу покой духа машины сама. Но я обязана буду зарегистрировать богохульство шестой категории!"

{n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

{n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

{n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

languages.text: {n}La technoprêtresse recule.{/n} « C'est de la folie ! De la technobarbarie ! Si vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à recourir à la force pour servir vos desseins irrévérencieux, je ne peux rien faire pour vous en empêcher. Je vais donc me charger moi-même d'entrer en contact avec l'esprit. Néanmoins, ce blasphème de catégorie six sera dûment consigné dans les archives du vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La technoprêtresse recule.{/n} « C'est de la folie ! De la technobarbarie ! Si vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à recourir à la force pour servir vos desseins irrévérencieux, je ne peux rien faire pour vous en empêcher. Je vais donc me charger moi-même d'entrer en contact avec l'esprit. Néanmoins, ce blasphème de catégorie six sera dûment consigné dans les archives du vaisseau ! »

languages.text: {n}La tecnosacerdotisa retrocede.{/n} «¡Esto es un ultraje! ¡Tecnobarbarismo! Si pretende recurrir a la fuerza bruta con este propósito irreverente, no puedo impedírselo. En lugar de ello, perturbaré al espíritu máquina yo misma. ¡No obstante, debo registrarlo como blasfemia de categoría seis!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La tecnosacerdotisa retrocede.{/n} «¡Esto es un ultraje! ¡Tecnobarbarismo! Si pretende recurrir a la fuerza bruta con este propósito irreverente, no puedo impedírselo. En lugar de ello, perturbaré al espíritu máquina yo misma. ¡No obstante, debo registrarlo como blasfemia de categoría seis!».

languages.text: {n}技术神甫退缩下来。{/n}“这简直是疯了！如此野蛮的行为！如果你打算用蛮力来实行你那无礼的目的，那我恐怕无法阻止你。算了，还是由我亲自来打扰机魂吧，但我一定要将这第六类亵渎行为记录在案！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}技术神甫退缩下来。{/n}“这简直是疯了！如此野蛮的行为！如果你打算用蛮力来实行你那无礼的目的，那我恐怕无法阻止你。算了，还是由我亲自来打扰机魂吧，但我一定要将这第六类亵渎行为记录在案！”

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は反発した。{/n} 「狂気です！技術的蛮行です！不遜な意図で武力に訴えるのなら、私は止められません。代わりに、私が機械精霊の邪魔をします。しかし、私はこれをカテゴリー6の冒涜として記録することになるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は反発した。{/n} 「狂気です！技術的蛮行です！不遜な意図で武力に訴えるのなら、私は止められません。代わりに、私が機械精霊の邪魔をします。しかし、私はこれをカテゴリー6の冒涜として記録することになるでしょう！」

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester schreckt zurück.{/n} "Das ist doch Irrsinn! Tech-Barbarentum! Wenn Ihr Eure pietätlosen Absichten mit Gewalt verfolgt, so kann ich Euch nicht aufhalten. Stattdessen werde ich den Maschinengeist selbst stören. Doch ich muss das als Blasphemie der Kategorie 6 verzeichnen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester schreckt zurück.{/n} "Das ist doch Irrsinn! Tech-Barbarentum! Wenn Ihr Eure pietätlosen Absichten mit Gewalt verfolgt, so kann ich Euch nicht aufhalten. Stattdessen werde ich den Maschinengeist selbst stören. Doch ich muss das als Blasphemie der Kategorie 6 verzeichnen!"

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Delilik bu! Tekno barbarlık! Hürmetten yoksun maksatlarında kaba kuvvete başvurursan seni durduramam. Bunun yerine makine ruhunu bizzat rahatsız ederim. Lakin bunu Kategori Altı dine aykırılık olarak kaydetmem gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest recoils.{/n} "This is madness! Tech-barbarism! If you would resort to brute force in your irreverent intentions, then I cannot stop you. Instead, I will disturb the machine spirit myself. However, I must register this as a Category Six blasphemy!"
